com.metaio.sdk
Interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

All Known Implementing Classes:
ARELActivity, ARELFragmentActivity, ARViewActivity, ARViewFragmentActivity, MetaioCloudARViewActivity
Enclosing class:
MetaioSurfaceView
public static interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

MetaioSurfaceView callback. Implement this callback to receive GLSurfaceView and it's Renderer events.

All callbacks are called inside rendering thread, therefore any expensive processing inside these methods should be done in another thread. Furthermore, any GUI operation must be performed in user interface thread.

See Also:
GLSurfaceView, GLSurfaceView.Renderer

Method Summary
 void onDrawFrame()
          This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame.
 void onSurfaceChanged(int width, int height)

Method Detail

onSurfaceCreated

void onSurfaceCreated()
This is called when GLSurfaceView has been created. The rendering contents can be loaded in this callback, e.g geometries. Furthermore, renderer parameters such as clipping plane limits can be updated. The audio renderer for movie textures should be registered in this callback.

See Also:
getAudioRenderer

onSurfaceChanged

void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                      int height)
Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.

Parameters:
width - Width of the surface view
height - Height of the surface view

onSurfaceDestroyed

void onSurfaceDestroyed()
Called when OpenGL surface is destroyed

onDrawFrame

void onDrawFrame()
This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame. The callback implementation must call IMetaioSDK.render() to update.
